scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a formal interior setting where a man in a golden robe, wearing a blue turban and holding a small object, stands before a seated figure in a similar golden robe, who holds a scepter. The seated figure has a long white beard and wears a golden headdress. Behind the standing man, a group of men in various colored robes and hats are gathered. The background features a wall adorned with medallions containing portraits and decorative inscriptions. The floor is tiled, and the scene is framed by ornate, gilded architectural elements at the bottom, suggesting a palace or a grand hall. The overall impression is one of an audience or a presentation of tribute.
